[Refill HP - Press Y 1.6.9]
DD000000 00000800
D3000000 087B4750
60000000 00000000
B0000000 00000000
00000058 00000064
D2000000 00000000

[Refill HP 2- Press Y 1.6.9]

60000000 00000000
B0000000 00000000

D2000000 00000000

B0000000 00000000

D2000000 00000000

[Infinite HP 1.6.9]
D3000000 087B4750
B0000000 00000000
D9000000 00000054
D6000000 00000058
D2000000 00000000

D2000000 00000000

*The Character Modifier codes also work on Story Mode. Use the code on save file menu. If you use it in game, you need to go to another area/reload the game to see the change.
